Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class TrPageLevelItem

Base class for all items below page level, which have a position and hence coordinates, i.e. TrRegion (TrTextRegion and TrTableRegion), TrTextLine, TrCell. Inherits TrItem.

Parameters
Type Name Description
TrContainer parentContainer

The item's parent container: No item can be instantiated without a known parent container.
